basics.name: Davide Placido
basics.label: PostDoc
basics.summary: I am a biomedical engineer with a strong interest in data science in healthcare. With a PhD in bioinformatics and biostatistics, I have expertise in developing machine learning models and handling heterogeneous biomedical data. Now, I am eager to leverage my research experience and translate these innovative applications into real-world solutions.

work.name: Postdoctoral researcher
work.summary: I am working on cancer detection using etherogeneous primary care data.

work.name: Research assistant + PhD
work.summary: I worked on machine learning models for early detection of pancreatic cancer using patient’s disease history from the Danish registries. I also worked on the development of a decision support tool for detecting clinical deterioration using EHR collected in the general depertments.

work.name: Visiting researcher
work.summary: I worked on validating the model trained in Denmark on an American dataset using Google cloud platform.

work.name: Research master student
work.summary: I worked on time-series from the intensive care department to improve a LSTM model using hand-crafted features from high-frequency data.
